CustomField.description: Note: If you add a new agreement/quote record type, the type must also be manually added to this set of picklist values to keep record types in sync between agreements/quotes and templates.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Note: If you add a new agreement/quote record type, the type must also be manually added to this set of picklist values to keep record types in sync between agreements/quotes and templates.
CustomField.label: Record Types
